by-product.translation[0].definitions[0]: something additional that is produced during a natural or industrial process
by-product.translation[0].definitions[1]: an unplanned additional result of something that you do
Job losses are an unfortunate byproduct of the recession.
by-product.translation[1].definitions[0]: something produced during the process of making something else, especially during an industrial process
Bran is a byproduct of the milling process.
by-product.translation[1].definitions[1]: something unexpected or unplanned that happens as a result of something else happening
The fiscal crisis is a byproduct of the recession.
